item.title: Officials search for bear that attacked a woman hiking on a popular Alaska trail
item.description: Alaska police say a brown bear attacked a woman as she hiked on a popular trail in Alaska’s Chugach Mountains

item.title: Dozens of peacocks and peahens go missing from Northern California hotel

item.title: New York to make phone calls free in its state prisons
item.description: New York will soon make phone calls free in its state prisons
